We are using and contributing to the information from the European Parliament Intergroup on Freedom of Religion or Belief and Religious Tolerance regarding Pakistan.

Furthermore we are monitoring Pakistan and the attributed GSP+ status to ensure that human rights treaties and principles are being respected and sufficient improvements are being made.

We use the EU Guidelines on the promotion and protection of freedom of religion or belief to remind the EU, its members states and Pakistan on its commitment to enforce religious freedom.
